bug.author: bradyoo
bug.summary: Persist Job remains in JobWorker even after cancel.
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? 2.2.0-SNAPSHOT, but reproducible in 2.1.1 and 2.0.x Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. PersistJob cancellation doesn't get processed properly. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) With AsyncThrough writeType
Write a large number of files as AsyncThrough Before all of them gets persisted, rm them all. Wait for a long time. Run jobservice report
You will see that there are a large number of jobs still stuck under CREATED/RUNNING. Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. 0 jobs under CREATED or RUNNING Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here. There is no report in 2.0 to see the bug clearly but the bug is nonetheless still there.
